text: (low droning)

- [Nguyen Van Hieu] The
Metaverse is a simulated,

digital twin environment
that uses augmented reality,

virtual reality and
blockchain to create spaces

for rich user interaction,
mimicking the real world.

Bizverse is Vietnam's
first Metaverse platform

integrating multiple
emerging technologies.
We are at the Metaverse for businesses
in the contactless economy,
where users can carry out
business activities such as,
trade events, conferences,
and exhibitions in the Metaverse.
Users can socialize,
watch, learn and play.
(percussion echoes)
(excited electronic music begins)

- [Dang Thien Binh] To
build the metaverse,

there are three
prerequisites: respond time,
security and scalability.
The AWS Cloud provides the right solution
to meet the requirements,

and we choose to be our
platform entirely on AWS.

As we grow, the number
of users are steadily
increasing day by day,
and we have estimated four gigabits

per second in traffic,
during peak periods.
As a small medium business,

we are always thinking about
the corporate businesses,

without compromising the
procurement and the latency

with AWS, we are constantly
receiving support
on how to optimize our infrastructure
while achieving low latency.
(chill electronic music begins)
- It's been an exciting year for us.

Our goal is to launch
Bizverse beyond Vietnam.
AWS is an excellent partner
to accompany us on the journey
as we take social networking

to the next level and connect
more people with the world.
(Chill electronic music fades)
